ip_assignments.description: List of IP routed and assigned by ZeroTier controller assignment pool. Does not include RFC4193 nor 6PLANE addresses, only those from assignment pool or manually provided.

ipv4_assignments.description: Computed list of IPv4 assigned by ZeroTier controller assignment pool. Does not include RFC4193 nor 6PLANE addresses, only those from assignment pool or manually provided.

ipv6_assignments.description: Computed list of IPv6 assigned by ZeroTier controller assignment pool. Does not include RFC4193 nor 6PLANE addresses, only those from assignment pool or manually provided.

rfc4193_address.description: Computed RFC4193 (IPv6 /128) address. Always calculated and only actually assigned on the member if RFC4193 is configured on the network.

zt6plane_address.description: Computed 6PLANE (IPv6 /60) address. Always calculated and only actually assigned on the member if 6PLANE is configured on the network.

auto_assign_6plane.description: Auto assign IPv6 /60 to members using 6PLANE adressing

auto_assign_rfc4193.description: Auto assign IPv6 /128 to members using RFC4193 adressing

auto_assign_v6.description: Auto assign IPv6 to members from ZeroTier assignment pool

multicast_limit.description: The maximum number of recipients that can receive an Ethernet multicast or broadcast. Setting to 0 disables multicast, but be aware that only IPv6 with NDP emulation (RFC4193 or 6PLANE addressing modes) or other unicast-only protocols will work without multicast.
